p: In this article the affiliation details for Barbara Borroni were incorrectly given as ‘Molecular Marker Laboratory, IRCCS Istituto Centro San Giovanni di Dio Fatebenefratelli, Brescia, Italy’, ‘Department of Clinical and Experimental Sciences, University of Brescia, Brescia, Italy’ and ‘Cognitive and Behavioural Neurology, Department of Continuity of Care and Frailty, ASST Spedali Civili Brescia, Brescia, Italy’ but should have been ‘Molecular Marker Laboratory, IRCCS Istituto Centro San Giovanni di Dio Fatebenefratelli, Brescia, Italy’, ‘Department of Clinical and Experimental Sciences, University of Brescia, Brescia, Italy’. The original article has been corrected.
